channel.title: The Wonderful World of Linus Bailey
channel.description:
Linus Bailey's tenth birthday, if measured on some kind of “So how did it go then?” scale, would score a one. Maybe a bit less. It started well, but then things went very badly indeed.
Linus' problem is that he makes things up. His mother, for instance, was found living as a head hunter in the Jungles of Borneo. His dad, a man called Nigel who Linus hasn't seen since he was two, is a Ninja Warrior currently living in Japan. His dad fights crime and saves people. Linus' Headmaster is evil and his jumper was knitted by slaves.
Linus Bailey's childhood is my childhood—a childhood where, during one fairly normal winter, the goldfish froze to death in the living room and we kids wrote our names on the ice that formed on the bedroom walls. Surely a life made up was better, warmer, more fun. The only difference between Linus and me is that all his mad stuff came true one frosty tenth birthday...

image.title: The Wonderful World of Linus Bailey

item.title: Linus 08
item.description: A battle underground puts Linus at the mercy of the Evil Lord, who has quite a sharp ruler.
item.itunes:subtitle: A battle underground puts Linus at the mercy of the Evil Lord, who has quite a sharp ruler....

item.title: Linus 07
item.description: An army moves down cabbage road, while dark deeds are afoot in the Evil Mines of Mortar.  Torville the pigeon gets in a flap.
item.itunes:subtitle: An army moves down cabbage road, while dark deeds are afoot in the Evil Mines of Mortar.  Torville the pigeon gets in a flap....

item.title: Linus 06
item.description: There are things under Linus' bed, including Ellie's scrapbook.  Nigel works out what's going on.
item.itunes:subtitle: There are things under Linus' bed, including Ellie's scrapbook.  Nigel works out what's going on....

item.title: Linus 05
item.description: The sinister forest is damp and dark, and Ninjas are bad with dates.
item.itunes:subtitle: The sinister forest is damp and dark, and Ninjas are bad with dates....

item.title: Linus 04
item.description: Linus doesn't want to go on the school trip but evil forces conspire against him.
item.itunes:subtitle: Linus doesn't want to go on the school trip but evil forces conspire against him....

item.title: Linus 03
item.description: An unpleasant cloud hovers over Linus' school, which seems to have turned into the Evil Lord of Mortar's Evil Castle.  And there's a form to sign...
item.itunes:subtitle: An unpleasant cloud hovers over Linus' school, which seems to have turned into the Evil Lord of Mortar's Evil Castle.  And there's a form to sign......

item.title: Linus 02
item.description: The morning of Linus' birthday reveals a camel, Welsh miners, a frozen woman and other assorted oddness
item.itunes:subtitle: The morning of Linus' birthday reveals a camel, Welsh miners, a frozen woman and other assorted oddness...

item.title: Linus 01
item.description: The day before his tenth birthday, Linus Bailey goes to school and gets into trouble
item.itunes:subtitle: The day before his tenth birthday, Linus Bailey goes to school and gets into trouble...
